scripts.asbuild: asc contracts/fogata/build/index.ts --config contracts/fogata/asconfig.json --use abort= --target release --use BUILD_FOR_HARBINGER=0
scripts.asbuild:harbinger: asc contracts/fogata/build/index.ts --config contracts/fogata/asconfig-harbinger.json --use abort= --target release --use BUILD_FOR_HARBINGER=1
scripts.asbuild-power: asc contracts/fogata/build/index.ts --config contracts/fogata/asconfig-power.json --use abort= --target release --use BUILD_FOR_HARBINGER=0
scripts.prebuild:prod: node setFogataVersion && node codeForTest false && yarn precompile
scripts.prebuild:test: node setFogataVersion && node codeForTest true && node auxAbi.js pre && yarn precompile && node auxAbi.js post
scripts.build-power: yarn prebuild:test && yarn asbuild-power && node codeForTest false
scripts.build-power:harbinger: yarn prebuild:test && yarn asbuild-power:harbinger && node codeForTest false
scripts.prerelease:prod: yarn build && yarn build:harbinger && yarn move-build
scripts.prerelease:test: yarn build-power && yarn build-power:harbinger && yarn move-build-power
scripts.prerelease: yarn prerelease:prod && yarn prerelease:test && node getSha256.js
scripts.move-build: copyfiles -u 4 contracts/fogata/build/release/fogata.wasm build && copyfiles -u 4 contracts/fogata/build/release/fogata-harbinger.wasm build && copyfiles -u 3 contracts/fogata/build/fogata-abi.json build && copyfiles -u 4 contracts/sponsors/build/release/sponsors.wasm build && copyfiles -u 3 contracts/sponsors/build/sponsors-abi.json build && copyfiles -u 4 contracts/pools/build/release/pools.wasm build && copyfiles -u 3 contracts/pools/build/pools-abi.json build
scripts.move-build-power: copyfiles -u 4 contracts/fogata/build/release/fogata-power.wasm build && copyfiles -u 4 contracts/fogata/build/release/fogata-power-harbinger.wasm build && copyfiles -u 3 contracts/fogata/build/fogata-abi-power.json build
scripts.move-build2: copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata.wasm contracts/fogata/build/release && copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata-harbinger.wasm contracts/fogata/build/release && copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata-abi.json contracts/fogata/build
scripts.move-build-power2: copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata-power.wasm contracts/fogata/build/release && copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata-power-harbinger.wasm contracts/fogata/build/release && copyfiles -u 1 build/fogata-abi-power.json contracts/fogata/build
